Name: [center]Lil Red Cap[/center]
Text: [center]Grandma Why are your eyes so big?[/center]

Name: [center]Grandma[/center]
Text: [center]So i can see you better my dear[/center]

Name: [center]Grandma[/center]
Text: [center]So i can hold you stronger my dear[/center]

Name: [center]Grandma[/center]
Text: [center]So i can feast upon you my dear![/center]
